title: unreasonable BYE from b2b after 200 OK
description:
Please consider as "well-known-issue" :
when calls have zero duration, and log shows that b2b sends BYE imidiately after called party 200 OK response - it means
that strackerd is stucked. Do restart for related env.
P.S. I faced the problem two times, both on hosted servers
description_text:
Please consider as "well-known-issue" : 
 when calls have zero duration, and log shows that b2b sends BYE imidiately after called party 200 OK response - it means 
 that strackerd is stucked. Do restart for related env.

title: No Rates Found for Account
description:
Possible fixes: 


1. Open some particular rate that Test Diaplan doesn't display but should and click Save & Close. Sometimes you need to add and remove some letter and then click Save to emulate change.


2. If Customer have “No Rates Found for Account xxx” in sip.log, but Test Dialplan shows it, just restart b2bua.
Be aware that it will drop all active calls on every environment within the one system.


1. /tmp/b2bua.sh stop
2. rm /var/env*/RatingManager.rtable.*.save
3. /tmp/b2bua.sh start
description_text:
Possible fixes:      1. Open some particular rate that Test Diaplan doesn't display but should and click Save & Close. Sometimes you need to add and remove some letter and then click Save to emulate change.     2. If Customer have “No Rates Found for Account xxx” in sip.log, but Test Dialplan shows it, just restart b2bua. Be aware that it will drop all active calls on every environment within the one system.     1. /tmp/b2bua.sh stop
2. rm /var/env*/RatingManager.rtable.*.save
3. /tmp/b2bua.sh start

title: Monitoring issues
description:
A summary all common roots that could cause graphs issues: 

1. snmpd isn't running/got stuck
Suggestion: kill or/and restart it

2. strackerd got stuck in some environment - it gathers statistic from all env's, and one stuck process will stop further gathering of information. 
Suggestion: killing/restarting

3. rrd_update got stuck, it should run each one minute and finish working in few seconds
Suggestion: kill stuck and wait until it run from cron

Kindly use ps and locate/grep to investigate those issues. Looking into logs could help you to find more reasons that affect monitoring graphs.

A summary all common roots that could cause graphs issues:
 
 1. snmpd isn't running/got stuck
Suggestion: kill or/and restart it
 
 2. strackerd got stuck in some environment - it gathers statistic from all env's, and one stuck process will stop further gathering of information. 
Suggestion: killing/restarting
 
 3. rrd_update got stuck, it should run each one minute and finish working in few seconds
Suggestion: kill stuck and wait until it run from cron
 
 
Kindly use ps and locate/grep to investigate those issues. 
Looking into logs could help you to find more reasons that affect monitoring graphs.
